phrases: That there is my pet, Bubbles- kun.
I thought it was a little strange.
Do not you think that play on words just now was the greatest?
You do not have to be afraid to laugh at it.
You were too tense to hear it, huh?
What am I going to do with you, for pity's sake?
Well then, at no extra charge, I will hit you with a different play on words.
I picked up the phone, but no one was home!
What did you come here for?
Oh, I was hoping to have you train me, Kaio- sama.
Anyone who hears a joke like that and does not laugh has a flawed character!
You expect me to train anyone like that!?
I should have expected as much, Kaio- sama!
I are not ever heard anything so funny!
You were just slow to notice it, that is all.
Are you going to train me?
I would not mind doing that.
You have to make me, Kaio- sama, the mastermind of gags,
laugh at one of your plays on words.
I have to make a play on words!?
If the pun is not at an adequate enough level, I will not laugh at it.
Apparently, you are not up to it.
If that is so, then give up, and go home!
You are no slouch at this, huh?
You are a pro, are not you?
Very well, I will give you my training.
N- never mind the gags, teach me martial arts.
What, you want to learn martial arts?
Why did not you say so sooner?
I want to see what kind of skill you possess.
It is just that there is something strange going on.
It is awfully hard to move, and my body feels so heavy.
Where did you come from, Earth?
Then it would be heavy here, huh?
This is a small planet, but it has incredible gravity, see?
I will bet it is about ten times what it is on your planet.
That means your own weight is ten times greater.
See how high you can jump.
That little bit is as high as I can go!
lf he can jump that high in ten times his normal gravity...
This guy here has a lot of promise!
Okay then, we will start your training.
How much time do you plan to spend with me?
I are not sure how many days it took for me to run down the Serpentine Road...
But I do not think I have much time.
I am told that there are these Saiyan guys who are coming to our
planet to do some awful stuff.
So I would like for you to train me until that time, however short it is!
You have had some nasty folks set their sights on you, all right.
I will check into when these Saiyans are going to reach Earth for you.
The Saiyans are flying that way, all right.
They will arrive on Earth in... let us see... about 158 days, I would say.
Yeah, these handy antenna are reliable, an' tenna some!
Maybe I should give up training you.
Still, there is only 158 days until the Saiyans arrive, huh?
Me training you on this planet for 158 days will have the same value
as if you trained for a thousand years on Earth.
Even if you do train with me,
there is no guarantee that you will be able to beat the Saiyans.
The two Saiyans that are headed for Earth have just that much awesome power.
To be honest with you, their strength is even greater than my own.
Even greater than yours, Kaio- sama!?
Which means that if you cannot at least surpass me,
it will be impossible for you to beat the Saiyans.
Okay then, how about we get started right away?
For the time being, until you can move fast enough to do that,
I am going to get you!
So he is already wearing super-weighted gear, is he?
That makes me quite a bit lighter, now!
I am not sure I can catch him.
If you cannot, then go home right now.
That is right- I are not eaten anything since I left the Snake Princess' place.
Say, I hate to ask, but could you give me something to eat?
That is unusual- a hungry deceased person...
Hey, how about showing a little restraint?
I am down ing the donburi!
I am full, I am full!
The taste notwithstanding, at least my stomach is full!
I get the feeling that maybe this man is not giving me enough respect.
I am surprised you do not find it dull staying on a planet this small.
If you set your mind to it, there are any number of fun things to do here.
Like counting how many blades of grass there are growing...
Recently, I have been getting into a new hobby...
Now, hurry up and catch Bubbles- kun.
Otherwise, you will never be able to get me to teach you any martial arts.
I will give it my all!
Put on those heavy-looking clothes and boots you took off earlier and then run after him.
But putting that stuff on makes it even harder to run!
The planet that the Saiyans are from had about the same gravity as here.
That is where they built up their bodies.
Do you now understand part of the secret to the Saiyans' strength?
But it is more than just that.
Saiyans are born with a natural fighting sense.
That is another thing that makes them so formidable.
Do not slow down your attack!
Do not be so needy, you dirty brat!
Sure enough, he only exhibits those dormant abilities of his
on the night of the full moon.
Looks like you at least cured yourself of being a crybaby
Say, Piccolo- san, you fought with Father a long time ago, right?
Our fight is not yet over.
If we are able to defeat the Saiyans, your father's turn comes next.
But Father told me that the reincarnated Piccolo- san
did not seem to be the same terribly evil person he was before.
I sort of think that, too.
Mother and Grandpa are still afraid of you, though.
Stop talking nonsense and get to sleep!
Tomorrow, we will not have the kind of gentle training we did today!
Since then, three weeks have gone by in the blink of an eye...
These shao-mai dumplings taste so good...
they taste shao good, I think you will find.
I have got gyoza by the gross!
He is in good spirits, huh?
He definitely does not have the slightest respect for me!
But I am not giving in!
He is as amazing as I thought.
He is already overcome the gravity here, has he?
He might be able to handle it!
The Saiyans' assault is not far away.
What kind of training will Goku receive from Kaio-sama,
now that he has finally met him?
